page.title: 10 SOUTH WRAXALL MANOR.
page.content:
We made a visit to one of the oldest, most historic, and beautiful houses houses in our survey area.It was{South {Wraxall Manor,}and the owner,{Mrs. {Leese,}showed us round the house and grounds. The first family to own the Manor were the{Longs.}In 1426,{Robert Long became an{M.P. for Wiltshire. On the outside walls of the Manor there are{gargoyles.}Inside,there are huge fireplaces with{intricate stone {carvings.}The owner showed us the Raleigh Room-where{Sir Walter Raleigh smoked his{first pipe.
A{farmhouse}is in the Manor grounds. It was built before the Manor and used to be a{hospice.}The farmland around the Manor is arable and used for cattle grazing.
